Judge: Bulger FBI file can be used as evidence

Notorious gangster Janes "Whitey" Bulger, whose trial begins Tuesday with jury selection, has denied being an FBI informant. But his informant file is extensive, the Globe has reported. (6:02 p.m.)

Apparent suicide of crew member aboard Red Sox owner's yacht

A 28-to-30-year-old man was found on the Iroquois, which belongs to Sox owner John Henry, police said. (3:58 p.m.)

MBTA's new alert service to debut

The new alert system will allow users to specify the specific train stations and bus stops that they use most often. (5:26 p.m.)

Dead boy's mother says she wouldn't hurt son

The mother of a 4-year-old boy who died Sunday under suspicious circumstances said she wants to know what happened to her son. (4:39 p.m.)

    Supreme Court: Police can take DNA without warrant
